title: Update shop branding text to Vikash Sports

requirements.summary: Replace the displayed shop/site title with "Vikash Sports" in the header and browser tab/page title (and remove the old name from user-facing branding text).
acceptanceCriteria: The header title text displays exactly "Vikash Sports".
The browser tab/page title displays "Vikash Sports" (or "Vikash Sports" plus an optional short suffix) and does not show the old name.
All user-facing text involved in this change is in English.
